description:
Kana has officially become part of the newspaper staff. Saki begins to train her on delivering newspapers. Kana writes down the paper route and pictures the streets in her mind as Saki is telling her. After breakfast, Saki suggested that Kana try the evening route when she confesses to not knowing how to ride a bike. All the bundled up newspapers weigh about the same as a small child so knowing how to ride a bike is quite important. So, Kana had one of the other members help her out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: はじめての, 新聞配達
